mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE COMMUNITY_CODE = ${communityCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - B_CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(B_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END B_CREATE_DATE,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT IMG_PATH || IMG_ORIG FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND COMMUNITY_CODE = ${communityCode} -- ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_COUNT, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_NO, M.PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(B.B_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') B_CREATE_DATE, TO_CHAR(B.B_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') B_UPDATE_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT I.IMG_PATH || I.IMG_ORIG FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND I.IMG_ORDER = 0) THUMBNAIL, (SELECT I.IMG_PATH || I.IMG_ORIG FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND I.IMG_ORDER = 0) IMG_OBJECT, E.EXHIBIT_SUB_TITLE, E.EXHIBIT_SITE, E.EXHIBIT_DATE, E.EXHIBIT_CONTACT, E.EXHIBIT_AUDIENCE, E.EXHIBIT_CHARGE, NVL((SELECT LISTAGG(AUTHOR_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY AUTHOR_NO) FROM AUTHOR A WHERE A.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO ), 'TBA') AUTHOR_NAMES, (SELECT EXHIBIT_INST_NAME FROM INSTITUTION I WHERE I.INSTITUTION_NO = E.INSTITUTION_NO) EXHIBIT_INSTITUTION, (SELECT GENRE_NAME FROM GENRE G WHERE G.GENRE_NO = E.GENRE_NO) EXHIBIT_GENRE, (SELECT EXHIBIT_HOST || EXHIBIT_SUPPORT FROM CONTRIBUTOR C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) HOST_SUPPORT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO=B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN EXHIBITION E ON(E.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) JOIN INSTITUTION ITT ON(ITT.INSTITUTION_NO = E.INSTITUTION_NO) JOIN GENRE GR ON (GR.GENRE_NO = E.GENRE_NO) JOIN CONTRIBUTOR CB ON(CB.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.COMMUNITY_CODE = #{communityCode} AND B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NO = ${boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, (SELECT I.IMG_PATH || I.IMG_ORIG FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND I.IMG_ORDER = 0 AND ROWNUM = 1) AS imagePath FROM BOARD B WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM BOARD_IMG I WHERE I.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND I.IMG_ORDER = 0 AND ( I.IMG_PATH LIKE '/images/%' OR I.IMG_PATH LIKE 'http%' ) )
